2025 San Francisco Giants Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 44-34, 2nd place in NL_West (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 71.9% to make postseason, 5.6% to win World Series

Manager: Bob Melvin (44-34)

President: Buster Posey (President, Baseball Operations)

General Manager: Zack Minasian

Farm Director: Kyle Haines

Scouting Director: Michael Holmes

Ballpark: Oracle Park

Attendance: 1,388,455 (7th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 93, Pitching - 93
    One-year: Batting - 93, Pitching - 92

Pythagorean W-L: 44-34, 332 Runs, 286 Runs Allowed
